item.title: Setting Up .NET Core with Angular CI/CD in Azure Devops
item.description: I have spent some time configuring a CI/CD pipeline for an web app using .net core 6.0 and Angular 14.0 to be automatically deployed to Azure App Service. Below is the working YAML: # ASP.NET # Build and test ASP.NET projects. # Add steps that publish symbols, save build artifacts, deploy, and more: # https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/devops/pipelines/apps/aspnet/build-aspnet-4 trigger: - test pool: vmImage: "windows-latest" variables: solution: "AspNetCoreSpa.sln" buildPlatform: "Any CPU" buildConfiguration: "Release" steps: - task: NuGetToolInstaller@1 displayName: Install Nuget - task: UseDotNet@2 displayName: Install 6.
